short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Crazy Ad Finder allows you to collect, save & hunt trending ads automatically from your facebook news feed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Crazy Ad Finder is an application that can help you collect Facebook Ad Feed.

You can only display ads and automatically scroll the page to help you view and collect Facebook Ad Feed faster,

To get the best of the extension, please follow the above steps:
1. If Facebook does not show you an ad for the first time, try to like the page that promotes the product you are interested in.
2. Like and comment on each product you are interested in, click to buy now, and let Facebook provide you with more similar products that you are interested in.
